channel.title: Organic compounds in everyday life?
channel.description:
Yeah, I'm that inattentive to my everyday duties...
Can you guys help me out and make a list of organic compounds we use in everyday life? I already have a couple (see below), and just need a couple more. The format is:
* Object which containe it - Common name (functional group) - IUPAC name - chemical formula
And the ones I already got are: * Tea and Coffee - Caffeine (Amine) - 1,3,7-trimethyl-1H-purine-2,6(3H,7H)-dione - C8H10N4O2 * Sugar - Sucrose (Ether) - α-D-glucopyranosyl-(1↔2)-β-D-fructofuranose - C12H22O11 * Paper - Cellulose (Ether) - 2-hydroxypropyl ether - (C6H10O5)n * Rubbing Alcohol (Alcohol) - isopropanol - C3H8O * Plastic (drink bottles) (Polyester) - Polyethylene terephthalate * Rubber (Alkenyl) - cis-1,4-polyisoprene - (C5H8)n
Thanx guise!

item.title: Organic compounds in everyday life?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Meh, I already handed it in. Thanks anyway guys. Also, I used chrisn2323’s idea, and “BOOOOOZZZZEE,” except I made it school-safe (fucking nazi capitalist american board of education pig dogs) and used gasoline instead

Thanks guize!

item.title: Organic compounds in everyday life?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

These are essentially based from yours, but still:

Paint Thinner - Turps - Turpentine - C10H16
Nail Polish Remover - Acetone - Propanone - CH3COCH3
BOOOOOZZZZEE - “Alcohol” - Ethanol - C2H5OH

And no, not Ammonia

Read full topic

item.title: Organic compounds in everyday life?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Yeah, I’m that inattentive to my everyday duties…

Can you guys help me out and make a list of organic compounds we use in everyday life? I already have a couple (see below), and just need a couple more. The format is:

  • Object which containe it - Common name (functional group) - IUPAC name - chemical formula

And the ones I already got are:

  • Tea and Coffee - Caffeine (Amine) - 1,3,7-trimethyl-1H-purine-2,6(3H,7H)-dione - C8H10N4O2
  • Sugar - Sucrose (Ether) - α-D-glucopyranosyl-(1↔2)-β-D-fructofuranose - C12H22O11
  • Paper - Cellulose (Ether) - 2-hydroxypropyl ether - (C6H10O5)n
  • Rubbing Alcohol (Alcohol) - isopropanol - C3H8O
  • Plastic (drink bottles) (Polyester) - Polyethylene terephthalate
  • Rubber (Alkenyl) - cis-1,4-polyisoprene - (C5H8)n

Thanx guise!

Read full topic
